title: New: Eyelid Kid – Time Travel
body:
Oh man.

This debut track from Cali’s **Eyelid Kid** makes me feel all fuzzy, in a good way. I’m a sucker for this sort of Vampire Weekend psych-tinged indie. From the occasional fluttering saxophone, to the odd interjection of female laughter, all built around the magical songwriting of the so-far anonymous Eyelid Kid, _Time Travel_ is perfectly obtuse and undeniably enjoyable. Check it out below.
